column4: i forget this: when burning a downloaded iso, what is the best speed to burn it to a disk at?
i know i don't want to go at max speed
isn't 16x good or should i go slower?
I think i remember there being errors going at max
oh, then lower it a notch or two
what kind of disc is it?
what are you burning onto the cd? (music/application/movie/etc?)
Burn at top speed, but verify the disk.
There should be an option in your burning software.
Tools -> Check Integrity after it's been burned
